item.title: How Do I Make A New Starting Place And Add Dummys Etc, To It?
item.dc:creator: @ChrisZ ChrisZ
item.description:
@ChrisZ wrote:

[quote=“sparkz2k7, post:5, topic:134452”]so i search that can som1 give me link to tut plz?[br][size=1]Posted on: 17 August 2007, 07:45:19[/size][hr]Is This what should come up?

[code]pHead=7;
pTorso=25;
pArms=29;
pHands=35;
pLegs=39;
pFeet=44;
pBeard=14;

	/*pHead=3;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=26;
	pHands=34;
	pLegs=36;
	pFeet=42;
	pBeard=0;*/

THIS THIS THIS THIS THIS THIS // initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = Change This To X;//Change This To The Same As There<–;
teleportToY = Y;//Y;

	// client initially doesn't know those values yet
	absX = absY = -1;
	mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1;
	currentX = currentY = 0;
	resetWalkingQueue();[/code][/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make A New Starting Place And Add Dummys Etc, To It?

item.title: How Do I Make A New Starting Place And Add Dummys Etc, To It?
item.dc:creator: @sparkz2k7 sparkz2k7
item.description:
@sparkz2k7 wrote:

so i search that can som1 give me link to tut plz?[br][size=1]Posted on: 17 August 2007, 07:45:19[/size][hr]Is This what should come up?

[code]pHead=7;
pTorso=25;
pArms=29;
pHands=35;
pLegs=39;
pFeet=44;
pBeard=14;

	/*pHead=3;
	pTorso=25;
	pArms=26;
	pHands=34;
	pLegs=36;
	pFeet=42;
	pBeard=0;*/

	// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
	teleportToX = 3253;//3072;
	teleportToY = 3434;//3312;

	// client initially doesn't know those values yet
	absX = absY = -1;
	mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1;
	currentX = currentY = 0;
	resetWalkingQueue();[/code]

Read full topic
